# Fake News Filter for AdGuard
# Blocking the fake news generated by CN
#
# Homepage: https://github.com/theralse/adgfilters
# License: https://mit-license.org/
#
# Last modified: 02 Oct 2019
#

||ctee.com.tw^

||infotimes.com.tw^
||www.luckydog.tw^
||lecoin.cc^
||new.ctv.com.tw^
||udn.com^
||cdns.com.tw^
||taiwan-reports.com^
||tvbs.com.tw^
||www.ettoday.net^
||ebc.net.tw^
||mirrormedia.mg^
||crntt.tw^

||www.ctia.com.tw^
||www.cnyes.com^
